skills.desc: Whenever you regain 1 unit of health, you can let another player of your Kingdom to draw 1 card.
skills.title: Prudence 淑慎

skills.desc: At the beginning of your turn, you can discard all your hand cards. By doing so, if the number of your discarded cards is not smaller than X, you regain 1 unit of health (X equals to your current health).
skills.title: Divine Wisdom 神智

skills.desc: You may use or play your red color suit card(s) as "Strike".
skills.title: Master of Warfare 武圣

skills.desc: Anytime you use a "Scroll" card you immediately draw a card from the deck before calculating the effect of the "Scroll" card.
skills.title: Intuition 集智

skills.desc: Your "Scroll" cards have infinite range.
skills.title: Wizardry 奇才

skills.desc:
Whenever you play Strike to another player in your play phase, the target can not dodge under the following circumstances: 
 1. The number of hand cards of the target player is greater or equal to your current units of health.
 2. The number of hand cards of the target player is smaller or equal to your attack range.
skills.title: Fearsome Archer 烈弓

skills.desc: During play phase, you may give any amount of hand cards to another Hero. You regain 1 life if the total amount of cards given is more than or equal to three.
skills.title: Kindness 仁德

skills.desc: Force ability: When other player Strike you, he/she needs to discard a basic card, or else that Strike has no effect you.
skills.title: Relish 享乐

skills.desc: You can skip your play phase, then discard a hand card at the end of your turn to give another player an extra turn.
skills.title: Devolution 放权

skills.desc: Passive Ability: When calculating your distance to other Heroes, subtract 1.
skills.title: Horsemanship 马术

skills.desc: When you target a Hero with "Strike", you may reveal a judgment. If the result is a red color suit, then your "Strike" cannot be "Dodged".
skills.title: Cavalry 铁骑

skills.desc: BARBARIANS has no effect on you. You are the source of damage caused by BARBARIANS.
skills.title: The Smoking Gun 祸首

skills.desc: During your drawing phase, if you are not at full health, you can forfeit drawing cards from the deck; instead, you display X cards from the top of the deck (X being the units of health you have lost thus far). For every card with hearts suit displayed, you regain 1 unit of health, then you discard those heart cards and acquire the remaining cards.
skills.title: Arise Again 再起

skills.desc: During your play phase, you can use a hand card with the suit of clubs as IRON SHACKLES铁索连环, or to re-draw 1 card.
skills.title: Shackle 连环

skills.desc: When you are at the Brink of Death, you can discard all of your cards (on-hand and equipped) and all cards in your pending area, then reset your character, draw three cards, and regain your health to 3 units.
skills.title: Resurrection 涅槃

skills.desc: Force ability: After you inflict 1 unit of damage to a player within distance of 1(horse count), you regain 1 unit of health.
skills.title: Insanity Streak 狂骨

skills.desc: If there is no armour card in your equipped item area, it is viewed as you have Eight Diagram Formation equipped.
skills.title: Eight Trigrams 八阵

skills.desc: During your action phase, you can use a red-suited on-hand card as BLAZE
skills.title: Arson 火计

skills.desc: You can use a black-suited on-hand card as Ward 无懈可击
skills.title: Scient 看破

skills.desc: During your play phase, you may use any amount of "Strike" cards.
skills.title: Battlecry 咆哮

skills.desc: You may treat your "Strike" as a "Dodge" or your "Dodge" as a "Strike".
skills.title: Courage 龙胆

skills.desc: During the Start phase of your turn, you may look at "X" amount of cards from the top of the deck (where X is the number of Heroes alive, up to a max of five). You may then put any amount of cards back to the top of the deck in any order, and the rest to the bottom of the deck.
skills.title: Astrology 观星

skills.desc: Passive Ability: You cannot be the target of "Strike" or "Duel" when you have no hand cards.
skills.title: Empty Fortress 空城

skills.desc: BARBARIANS南蛮入侵 have no effect on you. When any BARBARIANS 南蛮入侵 used by other players is placed into the discard pile after all damage has been resolved, you acquire it.
skills.title: Giant Elephant 巨象

skills.desc: Every time after you inflict damage to your target by using Strike, you can conduct a Points Duel with that target player. If you win, you acquire a card from that player.
skills.title: Fearsome Blade 烈刃
